00036 // Utility methods.
00037 std::string DoubleToString(double d) {
00038   char buf[2048];
00039   const size_t kBufSize = sizeof(buf);
00040   snprintf(buf, kBufSize, "%f", d);
00041   return buf;
00042 }
00043 
00044 std::string StringPrintf(const char* format, ...) {
00045   char buf[2048];
00046   const size_t kBufSize = sizeof(buf);
00047   va_list ap;
00048   va_start(ap, format);
00049   vsnprintf(buf, kBufSize, format, ap);
00050   va_end(ap);
00051   return buf;
00052 }

00058     : npp_(npp),
00059       text_box_(NULL) {
00060 }

00062 EventHandler::~EventHandler() {

00065 void EventHandler::Init(scm::Event* sys) {
00066   // wiring in the real event handler.
00067   // sys->Err(scm::EVENT_OK);
00068   evt_sys_ = sys;
00069 }
00070 
00071 bool EventHandler::addText(const char* cstr) {
00072   if (text_box_ == NULL)
00073     return false;
00074   NPVariant variant;
00075   // Create a a string variant to be set for the innerText.
00076   MakeNPVariant(cstr, &variant);
00077   // Report the string to the div.
00078   NPVariant result;
00079   browser->invokeDefault(npp_, text_box_, &variant, 1, &result);
00080   // Release the variant.
00081   browser->releasevariantvalue(&variant);
00082   browser->releasevariantvalue(&result);
00083   return true;
00084 }
00085 
00086 std::string EventHandler::EventName(double timestamp, int32_t type) {
00087   std::string str = DoubleToString(timestamp) + ": ";
00088   switch (type) {
00089     case NPEventType_MouseDown:
00090       return str + "MouseDown";
00091     case NPEventType_MouseUp:
00092       return str + "MouseUp";
00093     case NPEventType_MouseMove:
00094       return str + "MouseMove";
00095     case NPEventType_MouseEnter:
00096       return str + "MouseEnter";
00097     case NPEventType_MouseLeave:
00098       return str + "MouseLeave";
00099     case NPEventType_MouseWheel:
00100       return str + "MouseWheel";
00101     case NPEventType_RawKeyDown:
00102       return str + "RawKeyDown";
00103     case NPEventType_KeyDown:
00104       return str + "KeyDown";
00105     case NPEventType_KeyUp:
00106       return str + "KeyUp";
00107     case NPEventType_Char:
00108       return str + "Char";
00109     case NPEventType_Minimize:
00110       return str + "Minimize";
00111     case NPEventType_Focus:
00112       return str + "Focus";
00113     case NPEventType_Device:
00114       return str + "Device";
00115     case NPEventType_Undefined:
00116     default:
00117       return str + "Undefined";
00118   }
00119 }
00120 
00121 int EventHandler::handle(void* event) {
00122   NPPepperEvent* npevent = reinterpret_cast<NPPepperEvent*>(event);
00123   std::string str = EventName(npevent->timeStampSeconds, npevent->type);
00124 
00125   this->evt_sys_->PushEvent(npevent);
00126 
00127   // the rest of this will be gone.
00128   return 1;
00129   switch (npevent->type) {
00130     case NPEventType_MouseDown:
00131     case NPEventType_MouseUp:
00132     case NPEventType_MouseMove:
00133     case NPEventType_MouseEnter:
00134     case NPEventType_MouseLeave:
00135       str += StringPrintf(": mod %x, but: %x, x: %d, y: %d, click: %d",
00136                           npevent->u.mouse.modifier,
00137                           npevent->u.mouse.button,
00138                           npevent->u.mouse.x,
00139                           npevent->u.mouse.y,
00140                           npevent->u.mouse.clickCount);
00141       break;
00142     case NPEventType_MouseWheel:
00143       str += StringPrintf(": mod %x, dx: %f, dy: %f, wtx: %f, wty: %d: sbp %d",
00144                           npevent->u.wheel.modifier,
00145                           npevent->u.wheel.deltaX,
00146                           npevent->u.wheel.deltaY,
00147                           npevent->u.wheel.wheelTicksX,
00148                           npevent->u.wheel.wheelTicksY,
00149                           npevent->u.wheel.scrollByPage);
00150       break;
00151     case NPEventType_RawKeyDown:
00152     case NPEventType_KeyDown:
00153     case NPEventType_KeyUp:
00154       str += StringPrintf(": mod %x, key: %x",
00155                           npevent->u.key.modifier,
00156                           npevent->u.key.normalizedKeyCode);
00157       break;
00158     case NPEventType_Char:
00159       str += StringPrintf(": mod %x, text: ",
00160                           npevent->u.character.modifier);
00161       size_t i;
00162       for (i = 0; i < NACL_ARRAY_SIZE(npevent->u.character.text); ++i) {
00163         str += StringPrintf("%x ", npevent->u.character.text[i]);
00164       }
00165       str += ", unmod: ";
00166       for (i = 0;
00167            i < NACL_ARRAY_SIZE(npevent->u.character.unmodifiedText);
00168            ++i) {
00169         str += StringPrintf("%x ", npevent->u.character.unmodifiedText[i]);
00170       }
00171       break;
00172 
00173     case NPEventType_Minimize:
00174     case NPEventType_Focus:
00175     case NPEventType_Device:
00176       break;
00177 
00178     case NPEventType_Undefined:
00179     default:
00180       break;
00181   }
00182 
00183   addText(str.c_str());
00184   return 1;
00185 }
00186 
00187 bool EventHandler::is_text_box_set() {
00188   if (text_box_ != NULL)
00189     return true;
00190   return false;
00191 }
00192 
00193 bool EventHandler::set_text_box(NPObject* text_box_object) {
00194   text_box_ = text_box_object;
00195   // Keep a reference to the text box update object.
00196   browser->retainobject(text_box_object);
00197   // Announce that we are alive.
00198   addText("Set the callback for text\n");
00199   return true;
00200 }
00201 
00202 char* EventHandler::string_duplicate(const char* cstr, size_t* len) {
00203   *len = strlen(cstr);
00204   char* str = reinterpret_cast<char*>(browser->memalloc(*len + 1));
00205   if (NULL == str) {
00206     *len = 0;
00207     return NULL;
00208   }
00209   memcpy(str, cstr, *len + 1);
00210   return str;
00211 }
00212 
00213 void EventHandler::MakeNPVariant(const char* cstr, NPVariant* var) {
00214   if (NULL == cstr) {
00215     STRINGN_TO_NPVARIANT(NULL, 0, *var);
00216     return;
00217   }
00218   size_t len;
00219   char* name = string_duplicate(cstr, &len);
00220   if (NULL == name) {
00221     STRINGN_TO_NPVARIANT(NULL, 0, *var);
00222     return;
00223   }
00224   STRINGN_TO_NPVARIANT(name, len, *var);
00225 }
